about_the_game:
In this game, you cannot jump but only dash. Play as a ninja cat and use objects to dash through and climb your way to the top! Timing is important and it will take time to master the true technique of Dashing! This is a little game inspired by Jump King, Pogostuck, and Getting Over it with Bennet Foddy.

Features:

  • You cannot jump.
  • No checkpoints.
  • Tough but addictive gameplay.
  • Super Friendly/Unfriendly Streamer game, give or take.
  • To beat the game will demand full mastery of the Technique of Dashing.
  • No enemies. The only enemy is yourself.

And if you do play this game, just remember:
  • "To live is to suffer, to survive is to find some meaning in the suffering." - Nietzsche
  • "Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try and just dash one more time." - Thomas A. Edison (maybe)
  • "It's a skill issue" - Tomer (our sound guy)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: 2,6 GHz Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Cat Dash Go

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 @ 3.2 GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Cat Dash Go is a High-Stakes Precision Platformer where the only thing you can do is Dash. Play as a kitty that loves to collect shiny things! Find true significance in material possession by dashing to the top!
